Package org.eso.ias.command

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CommandListener
    The interface of the listener of commands received from the command topic
    CommandStringSerializer
    Interface to serialize/deserializer the CommandMessage to/from strings
    ReplyListener
    The listener of replies
    ReplyStringSerializer
    Interface to serialize/deserializer the ReplyMessage to/from strings
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CmdReplyThreadFactory  
    CommandJsonSerializer  
    CommandListener.CmdExecutionResult
    The data structure that the listener returns to the CommandManager
    CommandManager
    The CommandManager bae class for command executors subscribes as a consumer of the command topic and a producer of the reply topic.
    CommandMessage
    The java POJO representing a command to be published in the command kafka topic This POJO is serialized into a JSON string to be published in the kafka topic
    CommandSender
    Objects of this class send commands and optionally wait for the reply through the kafka topics.
    DefaultCommandExecutor
    The DefaultCommandExecutor provides a default implementation of the commands defined in CommandType.
    ReplyJsonSerializer  
    ReplyMessage
    The java POJO to send replies over the kafka topic.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CommandExitStatus
    The execution status of a command
    CommandType
    The commands supported by the core
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    StringSerializerException
    Th eexception generated when marshalling or unmarshalling commands and replies to and from strings.
